name: Object Ward. Demo
description:
Genre: Visual Novel, Dark Comedy, Psychological Drama, Romance (BxB/Bara, BxG)

Meet Manson Moss, a schizophrenic man who sees everyone with an inanimate object for a head. Due to a certain 'incident', he is sentenced to mandatory rehabilitation in one of New York's most ill-managed psych wards in the year of 1986. He plots his escape, but the eccentric occupants of the Ward can't let him leave—so they get a little friendly with him instead. Help Manson navigate love, psychosis, and countless misadventures in this dark comedy visual novel, Object Ward.

~Features~

-This visual novel will have two versions: R17 with a separate downloadable patch, and NSFW R18+ with a sexual content on/off button. The demo is R17.

-7k words

-1800x1200 Resolution

-Partial voice acting for some special characters.

-CG gallery and original soundtrack!

~Future Plans~

-Consensual, sexual activities between four adult men and two women from all walks of life with various personal struggles.

-140k words!

-7 Routes with around 2 hours playtime each.

-21 Endings with choices that matter.

~Meet the Characters~

~Staff~

Director, Artist, 3D Modeler, Programmer, Writer: thugzilla

Sketch Artists: RoughRabbit, TopHatCo

Profile Artist: Coda

Editor: Enraged Piece of Wood

GUI & Logo: ds-sans
